[quote]Quote:[hr]Djaser looks quite mature if that's his face. [hr][/quote]
I'm even greying and I'm only twenty years old!

Some time ago a metrosexual and beer loving German placed several pictures on the net. Apparently he has the same (nick)name as I have so that the pictures where all over google when searching on 'Djaser'. For that reason I took one of his silly pictures as an avatar pretending it was me. Unfortunately his pictures are all offline so that there is no point in continuing this little joke. To bad, it never was funny and now it never will be.
Although I hope LL still wants me.

title: Re: The moment you haven't been waiting for.
content:
The truth comes out.

To be honest... I thought Levellord wanted me too.

But then I find out her brother, Gareth, signs on her account a lot. (And posts here under LL's name every so often.)

All this time I though some New Zealand chick wanted me but as it turns out, I am just a gay-magnet.

Or it could of been Levellord, pretending to be a guy. (Pretending to be a girl pretending to be her brother...) Or she is the kind of girl who would just do ANYONE just because they are. Hell, for all we know she could of been showing Naj a thing or two...

Speaking of which... anyone ever hear back from that guy after LL's sleepover? Haven't seen him around much.

Hmm... You know what?

I say we do "The Public Commander Keen Forum's Hottest Contest." All the females on the forum could vote for their favorite hottest guy, and the guys could vote for the hottest girl.

Ok so lets list all the contestants so far.

Guys:
Mr. Too Much Sluggy Time.
Allstories
Djaser
Xky
Jimage
Mr.Hundred Twenty Million
Zach Vitamin

Girls:
Levellord
DaVince21

Androgynous:
Galaxie (Hey so many people mistake me for a chick online...)

Check this out; for my friend Jasmine's birthday we went to Spooks; its an old psychiatric ward. What they tell you is its meant to be spooky. What they don't tell you is that people dressed up in monster makeup will stalk you and chase you around with sharp stuff, yelling screaming and attacking you.

Here are some photos they took for the birthday girl, [you can purchase em apparently] You can see me hiding behind other people a lot:

[url=http://emilylane.co.nz/index.php?category=gallery/Spookers/05-08-06&start=152]emilylane.co.nz/index.php...&start=152[/url]

Szevvy Forever!
And Spleen never!

-Levellord
